scripts.start:backend: cd apps && cd backend && npm start
scripts.start:frontend: cd apps && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.start: npm run start:backend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd apps && cd backend && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd apps && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd apps && cd backend && npm test
scripts.test:frontend: cd apps && cd frontend && npm test
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
